=== Installation ===
* Installed Gutsy Gibbon (Ubuntu 7.10) 32-bit from the live CD.
* Installed Hardy Heron (Ubuntu 8.04) 32-bit from both the live CD and the alternate desktop installer.
* Installed Intrepid Ibex (Ubunt 8.10) 32-bit from alternate desktop installer.
* Installed Jaunty Jackelope (Ubunt 9.04) 32-bit by upgrading from 8.10.
